text: "Baby I'm-a Want You" is a 1971 song by American band Bread and is the title track to their fourth studio album of the same name. It went to number 3 in the United States, number 5 in Canada, number 8 in Australia and number 14 in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1971 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Bread (band) songs
title: Baby I'm-a Want You (song)
